title: Keir Starmer – 2020 Statement on EHRC Report
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 29 October 2020.
content:
This morning the Equality and Human Rights Commission published their final report into anti-semitism in the Labour Party.
